body:
Hey minecrafters!!!!!!!!

Sorry for the short notice, but we are going to be hosting a map testing event at 4:30PM EST today (Saturday 29th October). 

If your map was recently accepted, you can see it play - we will hold more testing events so you'll get to see your map played.

There will be a TS channel for you to give feedback to mapdevs and to talk to other players. 

We hope to see you there!!!!!!

title: Map Testing Event
